title: ‘Four of hearts’ salad, bone-in rib-eye: Try Adam Richman’s Valentine’s Day recipes - NBC News
text:
‘Four of hearts’ salad, bone-in rib-eye: Try Adam Richman’s Valentine’s Day recipes 
Adam Richman, host of the Travel Channel’s “Secret Eats,” is in the TODAY kitchen to demonstrate his recipes for a hearty salad and a delicious rib-eye, perfect to put your Valentine’s Day date in a romantic mood. Previous
